inclusion.criterion: new diagnosis of ANCA associated vasculitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Wegener's granulomatosis was diagnosed for him

inclusion.criterion: renal involvement attributable to active ANCA associated vasculitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Elevated serum creatinine between 150 and 500 umol/l - renal biopsy

inclusion.criterion: serum ANCA positive by indirect immunofluorescence (IIF) and positivity in the anti-PR3 or anti-MPO by ELISA
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: more than two weeks treatment with cyclophosphamide (CYC) or other cytotoxic drug within previous 6 months or with oral corticosteroids (OCS) for more than 4 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: co-existence of another multisystem autoimmune disease, e.g. SLE
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago.
